...What is love?%K%P
It's a question that sounds simple, but isn't.%K%P
I didn't know what about me gave Sara so much hope,\nit wasn't like I'd had a lot of experience\nwith romance. 'A lot' actually meaning none at all.%K%P
It was absurd to think\nI could teach anyone about love.%K%P
On the contrary, I wanted someone to teach me...%K%P
'I'm really sorry about this, but help me, PLEASE!'%K%P
I was at Kagura and Shuri's work,\nshamelessly begging for help.%K%P
'So I heard the words, but I don't get it.\nWhy do you need to learn about love again?'%K%P
'Oh, could it be that you've fallen for someone?!\nWait... Is it me? Oh nooo, that just won't dooo!'%K%P
'Yeah, yeah, don't get yourself all wound up.\nThere's no way Yamato would ever fall for you.'%K%P
'Really? I thought we had some chemistry...'%K%P
'Hey, Yamato...\nCome on, admit it. You like me, don't you?'%K%P
Kagura came sidling up to me, showing off her charms.%K%P
She was a beautiful goddess and\nthe revealing costume she was wearing\ndid contribute to my rising pulse.%K%P
'Well, if you're asking if I like you or dislike you,\nI guess I'd put you in the like category...'%K%P
'But your personality is still lacking...'%K%P
'Heeeey!\nEven if you think something like that,\nyou don't have to be so direct about it!'%K%P
'Yamato is just honest with himself.'%K%P
'Uggh... Well, since it's not me,\nthat must mean you like Shuri!'%K%P
'Huh? Hold on, why does it have to be me?'%K%P
'If it's not me, then it has to be you!'%K%P
'I-I guess so... Oh, but... That's just...\nI'm an idol, I'm not supposed to have a boyfriend...'%K%P
'Oh, look at you, you love it!'%K%P
Kagura was staring in distaste\nwhile Shuri fidgeted in her seat.%K%P
I really wasn't sure of the best way to interrupt,\nso I just stared at them.%K%P
We never ended up getting anywhere,\nso I gave up and figured I'd try again later.%K%P
I lured them over with the promise of leftover curry.%K%P
'*Munch munch* Mmm, curry is so good\non the second day...'%K%P
'Kagura, manners!'%K%P
'Now, now. You eat up too, Shuri.'%K%P
'Yamato, your mom's curry is sooo good!\nIf Shuri's not eating, can I have hers?'%K%P
'I AM eating!\nDon't go snatching people's food.'%K%P
Shuri started eating too,\nkeeping guard against Kagura.%K%P
'Oh, the Tatsumis' curry really is good!'%K%P
'Isn't it? Isn't it? It's the best, right??'%K%P
'Why do you sound so proud?\nYamato's mom is the great one.'%K%P
'I know, I know.\nBut I never knew that Sara liked curry so much...'%K%P
'What? How could you not know that?\nIt's even in the L☆SEVEN fan book!'%K%P
'What's that? And are you telling me you know\nwhat Sara's favorite things are?'%K%P
'Well, I think that stuff would be common knowledge\nfor anyone wanting to join L☆SEVEN.'%K%P
Having said this, Shuri turned her gaze my way.%K%P
'Sorry, I didn't know until the other day myself.'%K%P
'See, Yamato didn't know either!\nShuri, you're the weird one for knowing.'%K%P
'You and Yamato are both just too uninformed...'%K%P
Shuri rolled her eyes at us.%K%P
Personally, I felt she just knew too much,\nbut it might actually be common knowledge\nfor L☆SEVEN fans.%K%P
'But, Sara sure does come by here\na lot since she retired.'%K%P
'Yeah, after all that I think it's kind of hard\nto hang out with her old friends.'%K%P
'Well, if she's coming to see you, Yamato...'%K%P
'That's got to be a pretty nice perk, right?'%K%P
'I can't deny it...\nI do spend a lot more time with Sara now.'%K%P
'Hmm...'%K%P
Suddenly, her gaze seemed to carry a deeper meaning.%K%P
Kagura followed her lead and stared at me, too.%K%P
'Oh, I get it... So that's how it is, hm?'%K%P
'To suddenly inquire about love,\nI was wondering what might be up.\nAnd there it is...'%K%P
'Yamato, you've fallen for Sara, haven't you?'%K%P
'Huh?! What-that came out of nowhere...'%K%P
'Are we wrong?'%K%P
'Yeah...well, I mean...no, you're not...but...'%K%P
I had always had an attraction toward Sara.%K%P
And now, I was hoping she could sing again.%K%P
I wanted to see her smile like she used to,\nand I wanted to help her in any way I could.%K%P
'I knew it.\nWell, it's totally understandable.'%K%P
'It is... She's so beautiful, and mature...\nOn top of that, she's really nice,\nand she smells good too!'%K%P
'She does smell good, but you don't need to\nbring that up now.'%K%P
I knew well that Sara smelled good.%K%P
She always had a scent like flowers,\none that soothed the heart.%K%P
'But... I mean, there's no way\nSara sees you that way, Yamato, right?'%K%P
'Exactly. She treats you more like a brother.'%K%P
'Yeah, I guess you're right...'%K%P
They didn't need to point it out, not after\nall this time. It was clear that Sara had always\nviewed me as a younger brother.%K%P
'What are you going to do?\nTell her how you feel and accept certain,\nutter rejection?'%K%P
'What, how are you so sure she'll reject me?'%K%P
'Well, I mean... Come on.\nYou're really reaching for the stars there.'%K%P
'She may not be a Divine Idol any more,\nbut Sara is still really popular.'%K%P
'People actually say she got even more popular after\nshe quit. She's beautiful and kind, and now she's\nmore versatile. The TV shows are fighting over her.'%K%P
'So you're saying she's even further out of reach...'%K%P
Sara never really talked much about work,\nbut now that I thought about it, it was easy to see.%K%P
'I feel bad for you, falling for someone like that.'%K%P
'Beauty is a cruel mistress.'%K%P
'Sara hasn't done anything bad.\nI'm the one who's in the wrong.'%K%P
I went along with Kagura's little remark.%K%P
The two of them looked at me pitifully\nand sighed deeply.%K%P
'I feel sorry for you, so I'll give you some advice.\nWhatever you do, don't go telling her how you feel\nright away.'%K%P
'First of all, why not invite her out for some fun?\nI bet she'd go along with that, at least.'%K%P
'Ohh yeah, just like a date!'%K%P
'Just don't call it a date!\nJust say you'd like to go somewhere.'%K%P
'O-Okay, got it. I'll consider that...'%K%P
'I'm happy to advise you on fashion,\nso feel free to ask any time.'%K%P
'Me too, me too!\nI can tell you some good spots for dates!'%K%P
'Kagura, how do you know about date spots...?'%K%P
'I know all about the Goddess Cafes in Akiba!'\nAlso, where to buy idol merchandise\nor computer parts...'%K%P
'Listen, Yamato.\nWhatever you do, don't ask Kagura for advice.'%K%P
'I know. I'm not that stupid.'%K%P
'Now hold on! You guys are so mean!'%K%P
